column2: As I have abolished the power of the council completely, my [empowered_spouse.GetHusbandWife] is no longer able to support me in the matters of rulership. [empowered_spouse.GetSheHeCap] is clearly upset about this matter.

As I have enacted a one-gender only succession law, the dynamics of the realm have become such that my [empowered_spouse.GetHusbandWife] is no longer able to support me in the matters of rulership. [empowered_spouse.GetSheHeCap] is clearly upset about this matter.
